page.title: 09Employers in Snape, Yorks.
page.content: There are 2 main employers in Snape. Hares is a building firm. It employs many people, mainly from outside the village.Hares build barns, sheds, garages and many other things. Carricks is a family firm.They are greengrocers and fish merchants.They employ 3 people who live out of the village and 20 from Snape.Twelve of these are from their own family. Carricks have market stalls at Bedale, Richmond, Northallerton, Leyburn and Ripon.They get fruit and vegetables from Leeds and fish from Hartlepool,Whitby and Hull. Carricks smoke and fillet the fish on their own premises in Snape.
